Package org.youscope.common.measurement

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Measurement
    Represents a measurement a microscope should do.
    MeasurementListener
    A listener which gets notified about the progress of a measurement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MeasurementConfiguration
    Superclass of all configurations of measurements.
    SimpleMeasurementContext
    A simple implementation of a measurement context.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MeasurementState  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MeasurementException
    Exception thrown by a measurement to indicate that its initialization, execution or deinitialization failed.
    MeasurementRunningException
    Exception thrown if a measurement component should be changed while measurement is running.
